nodes.text: The Dark Reliquary was an ancient tomb built in the Flamewood in the Old Paths region of the planet Voss. During the Galactic War, it was raided by Sith droids for valuable artifacts, and a smuggler fought through the droids to recover artifacts for Scratch.
The Dark Reliquary appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it is the location of the Smuggler class mission "Buyer's Remorse" on Voss.
